name: Happy Piggy
description:
The Piggy Bank is empty, the golden coins are about to drop out of the machine. Please find a path and draw the line to save enough coins into the Piggy Bank and make it happy!

Limber up your wits and try to collect all the coins with a perfect line.

Features:
*Free to play, play it anywhere anytime, no connection required!
*Simple rules but very attractive.
*Enjoy the beautiful sound when the coins go into the piggy bank.
